title: Seattle City Council 3/1/2021
description:
View the City of Seattle's commenting policy: seattle.gov/online-comment-policy

In-person attendance is currently prohibited per Washington State Governor's Proclamation 20-28.15, until the COVID-19 State of Emergency is terminated or Proclamation 20-28 is rescinded by the Governor or State legislature. Meeting participation is limited to access by telephone conference line and online by the Seattle Channel.
Agenda: Call to Order, Roll Call, Presentations, Approval of the Journal, Adoption of the Introduction and Referral Calendar, Approval of the Agenda; Public Comment; Payment of Bills; Appointments and Reappointments to Office of Labor Standards, Seattle Housing Authority Board, Sweetened Beverage Tax Community Advisory Board; CB 119975: relating to land use and zoning; Res 31994: adopting the Seattle City Council 2021 Work Program; Res 31995: adopting the Statements of Legislative Intent for the 2021 Adopted Budget and 2021-2026 Adopted Capital Improvement Program; Res 31996: setting the time and place for hearings for Local Improvement District No. 6751.
Advance to a specific part
Presentations - COVID-19 victims and survivors day - 1:00
Public Comment - 19:07
Payment of Bills - 29:10
Appointments and Reappointments - 30:21
CB 119975: relating to land use and zoning - 41:45
Res 31994: adopting the Seattle City Council 2021 Work Program - 52:52
